table.mysql: CREATE TABLE `{TABLE.events_details}` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `active` tinyint(1) unsigned default '0', `lang` varchar(5) NOT NULL default '', `title` varchar(255) default NULL, `introduction` text, `maintext` text, `mod_date` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `mod_user` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `creation_date` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `creation_user` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `image` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `image_version` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `author` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `form` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `link` text, `link_external` int(1) unsigned default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`,`lang`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM; alter table `{TABLE.events_details}` ,add column `registertpl` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '' after `link_external`;

CREATE TABLE `{TABLE.events_tree_details}` ( `node_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `lang` char(3) NOT NULL default '', `creation_date` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `creation_user` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `mod_date` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `mod_user` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `title` varchar(255) default NULL, `description` varchar(255) default NULL, `active` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `isFolder` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `public` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`node_id`,`lang`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM; INSERT INTO `{TABLE.events_tree_details}` (node_id, lang, title, active, isFolder) VALUES (1, 'de', 'Root', 1, 1); INSERT INTO `{TABLE.events_tree_details}` (node_id, lang, title, active, isFolder) VALUES (1, 'en', 'Root', 1, 1);
